text: Ŵantendelaga yajukusaka, kutandila yumba yammakome gakunyang’amala, itusitusi, mataalo (mabeseni) gamakulungwa ganti mpela matanda, kwisa soni majanje gachitamile (pachisisa ligongo lya ukulu nnope). (Twasalile kuti): “Panganyani, E ŵaliŵasa lya Daudi! (Masengo gambone gakulosya) kutogolela (ukoto wampedwile).” Sano ŵannonope mwa achikapolo Ŵangu ni ŵali ŵakutogolela
